original_text: And when the Philistine looked and saw David, he disdained him, for he was but a youth, ruddy and handsome in appearance.
korean_text: 그 블레셋 사람이 둘러보다가 다윗을 보고 업신여기니 이는 그가 젊고 붉고 용모가 아름다움이라

sentences.original_text: And when the Philistine looked and saw David,
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람이 다윗을 보고 바라볼 때에,

sentences.original_text: for he was but a youth,
